/*
nodes:
000001B8 0000018C 00000160 00000134 00000108 000000DC 000000B0 00000084 00000058 0000002C 00000000 FFFFFFFF

                                   dx       dy       dz       sibling  child
1B8		FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 FFFFFFFF 0000018C 00000000 00000000 00000000 
 18C	0A0015E0 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000160 00000000 00000000 00000000 
  160	FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 C0400000 41D00000 00000000 000000B0 00000134 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   134	0A0010F8 00000000 00000000 40400000 C1D00000 00000000 00000108 FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   108	0A0011C0 00000000 00000000 40400000 C1D00000 00000000 000000DC FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   DC	0A001288 00000000 00000000 40400000 C1D00000 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
  B0	FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 40000000 41D00000 00000000 FFFFFFFF 00000084 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   84	0A001338 00000000 00000000 C0000000 C1D00000 00000000 00000058 FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   58	0A0014C8 00000000 00000000 C0000000 C1D00000 00000000 0000002C FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
   2C	0A001400 00000000 00000000 C0000000 C1D00000 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
 00		0A001588 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF 00000000 00000000 00000000 
*/

% all the node translations cancel each other out!
dl	1588
dl	1400
dl	14C8
dl	1338
dl	1288
dl	11C0
dl	10F8
dl	15E0

% simple method
%dl	1688
